org.nebularis.defproxy.introspection
Class MethodInvokerTemplate

java.lang.Object
  org.nebularis.defproxy.introspection.MethodInvokerTemplate
All Implemented Interfaces:
MethodInvoker
Direct Known Subclasses:
TargetSiteWrapper
public class MethodInvokerTemplate
extends java.lang.Object
implements MethodInvoker

Default, reflection based MethodInvoker, providing additional support for template methods. Subclasses can override the details of the target site prior to method invocation (by overriding the beforeInvocation(Object, java.lang.reflect.Method, Object[]) method), or alter the return value (overriding the afterInvocation(Object, CallSite) method).

beforeInvocation

protected CallSite beforeInvocation(java.lang.Object delegate,
                                    java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                                    java.lang.Object[] params)
Called immediately before invocation, this method must generate a CallSite for the invocation, whose return value (i.e., the result of calling CallSite.dispatch()) will be passed to afterInvocation(Object, org.nebularis.defproxy.introspection.CallSite) for post-processing prior to returning it to the caller.

Parameters:
delegate -
method -
params -
Returns:
